alert.note: Alert for McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 12:14PM CDT until October 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McHenry County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1214 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harvard, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McHenry, Woodstock, Fox Lake, Johnsburg, Lakemoor, Spring Grove, Wonder Lake, Pistakee Highlands, Genoa City, Richmond, Hebron, Bull Valley, McCullom Lake, Ringwood and Greenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
